tweet: I am rolling up my sleeves for 2019. Before we kick off the 116th Congress, please take a look at some of my travels around the district in 2018. I am grateful & honored to serve as your member of the House of Representatives. Thank you...& Happy New Year! http://bit.ly/2LHivGZ

Today is the 50th anniv of the historic mission of Apollo 8, the first manned spaceflight to orbit the moon
As the crew approached the lunar sunrise on Christmas Eve, they became the first humans to see the entirety of the Earth at once with their own eyes http://bit.ly/2QOblGS

#FirstStepAct is the biggest overhaul of our fed criminal justice sys in a generation; making our criminal justice sys fairer & more just by incentivizing & better-preparing low-risk non-violent prisoners incarcerated in fed prisons for successful re-entry into their communities.

This afternoon Congressman Zeldin and I met with @NorthportVAMC administrators to get an update on reopening Beacon House, the demolition of buildings 1 and 2, other infrastructure upgrades, and my goal of building an affordable assisted living project at the Northport campus. pic.twitter.com/4986IGdY2r
I have been a co-sponsor of this gun violence prevention background check bill. Moving it along quickly will be much-needed good news. https://politi.co/2ErlVvK
Today I chaired the Board of Visitors meeting at the U.S. Merchant Marine Academy. pic.twitter.com/oltAkmzH4k
